mapper.select: select a.employee_id ,a.employee_cd ,a.employee_name1_last ,a.employee_name1_first ,b.employee_id as employee_id_skill ,b.final_education ,b.department ,b.graduation_date ,b.notices ,b.biko from am005_employee a left join bt001_skill b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id where a.employee_id = #{employee_id}

select a.employee_id ,a.employee_cd ,a.employee_name1_last ,a.employee_name1_first ,c.organization_cd ,e.organization_name ,b.employee_id as employee_id_skill ,b.final_education ,b.department ,b.graduation_date ,b.notices ,b.biko ,b.update_date from am005_employee a left join bt001_skill b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id left join am006_employeebelongs c on c.employee_id = a.employee_id and c.start_yearmonth = (select max(d.start_yearmonth) from am006_employeebelongs d where d.employee_id = c.employee_id
and d.start_yearmonth <= to_char(now(),'YYYYMM'))
left join am002_organization e on e.organization_cd = c.organization_cd order by a.employee_cd

select a.employee_id ,a.employee_cd ,a.employee_name1_last ,a.employee_name1_first ,c.organization_cd ,e.organization_name ,b.employee_id as employee_id_skill ,b.final_education ,b.department ,b.graduation_date ,b.notices ,b.biko from am005_employee a left join bt001_skill b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id left join am006_employeebelongs c on c.employee_id = a.employee_id and c.start_yearmonth = (select max(d.start_yearmonth) from am006_employeebelongs d where d.employee_id = c.employee_id
and d.start_yearmonth <= to_char(now(),'YYYYMM'))
left join am002_organization e on e.organization_cd = c.organization_cd where a.employee_cd like CONCAT('%' , #{employee_cd} , '%') and a.employee_name1_last like CONCAT('%' , #{employee_name1_last} , '%') and e.organization_name like CONCAT('%' , #{organization_name} , '%') and COALESCE(b.biko,'') like CONCAT('%' , #{biko} , '%') order by a.employee_cd

select a.employee_id ,a.employee_cd ,a.employee_name1_last ,a.employee_name1_first ,c.organization_cd ,e.organization_name ,b.employee_id as employee_id_skill ,b.final_education ,b.department ,b.graduation_date ,b.notices ,j.certification_name --社員資格 ,b.biko ,f.certification_no ,f.disp_order ,f.start_yearmonth ,f.end_yearmonth ,f.business_content ,f.biko as careerbiko ,g.technology_Lang --技術区分（開発言語） ,g.technology_OS --技術区分（OS） ,g.technology_DB --技術区分（DB） ,h.process_name --業務経歴工程 from am005_employee a left join bt001_skill b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id left join am006_employeebelongs c on c.employee_id = a.employee_id and c.start_yearmonth = (select max(d.start_yearmonth) from am006_employeebelongs d where d.employee_id = c.employee_id
and d.start_yearmonth <= to_char(now(),'YYYYMM'))
left join am002_organization e on e.organization_cd = c.organization_cd left join bt003_career f on b.employee_id = f.employee_id left join ( select a.employee_id ,a.certification_no ,string_agg( case b.technology_kbn when '01' then b.technology_name --技術区分（開発言語） else null end,',' order by b.disp_order,b.technology_name) as technology_Lang ,string_agg( case b.technology_kbn when '02' then b.technology_name --技術区分（OS） else null end,',' order by b.disp_order,b.technology_name) as technology_OS ,string_agg( case b.technology_kbn when '03' then b.technology_name --技術区分（DB） else null end,',' order by b.disp_order,b.technology_name) as technology_DB from bt004_careertechnology a left join bm002_technology b on a.technology_id = b.technology_id group by a.employee_id ,a.certification_no ) g on f.employee_id = g.employee_id and f.certification_no = g.certification_no left join ( select a.employee_id ,a.certification_no --業務経歴工程 ,string_agg(b.process_name ,',' order by b.disp_order,b.process_name ) as process_name from bt006_careerprocess a left join bm004_process b on a.process_id = b.process_id group by a.employee_id ,a.certification_no ) h on f.employee_id = h.employee_id and f.certification_no = h.certification_no left join ( select a.employee_id ,string_agg(b.certification_name ,',' order by b.disp_order,b.certification_name ) as certification_name from bt002_empcertification a left join bm001_certification b on a.certification_id = b.certification_id group by a.employee_id ) j on a.employee_id = j.employee_id where a.employee_cd like CONCAT('%' , #{employee_cd} , '%') and a.employee_name1_last like CONCAT('%' , #{employee_name1_last} , '%') and e.organization_name like CONCAT('%' , #{organization_name} , '%') and COALESCE(b.biko,'') like CONCAT('%' , #{biko} , '%') order by a.employee_cd ,f.disp_order ,f.start_yearmonth ,f.end_yearmonth
